title: 6 Ways Dead
description: 6 travelers pay to cross for a chance to find what they want most from life, in the land of the dead. Across the river the dead reside in an Earthly underworld. Each step of the journey is fraught with danger. Will any of the heroâ€™s find what they are looking for, or will they be found 6 Ways Dead.
author: T.L. Decay
